page.title: 15Public House Near Goonhavern
page.content: The local public houses play an important part in the social life of the residents of Goonhavern and the surrounding area.People visit them to eat and drink and to meet friends. In addition,various groups of men and women get together to play card and board games.One of the most popular of these games is Euka.Euka teams are made up and inter pub and club matches are arranged.These are taken very seriously and are very competitive.The hosting public house arranges refreshments and here again great pride is taken in laying on a mini feast.The matches are arranged including dominoes and darts.The local pub here is the New Inn.Summer time here is a real treat as ploughmans lunches are eaten in the sunny garden on ample wooden tables and chairs provided by the innkeepers good wife.
